Package image

Interface ImageInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Image
public interface ImageInterface
Basic interface for images based on a rectangular area of pixels

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getHeight()
    returns height of the image
    Pixel
    getPixel(int x, int y)
    get the pixel at coordinates (x,y) of this image. (0,0) is top left corner pixel.
    int
    getWidth()
    returns width of the image

  • Method Details

    • getWidth

      int getWidth()
      returns width of the image
      Returns:
      width of the image

    • getHeight

      int getHeight()
      returns height of the image
      Returns:
      height of the image

    • getPixel

      Pixel getPixel(int x, int y) throws UnknownPixelException
      get the pixel at coordinates (x,y) of this image. (0,0) is top left corner pixel.
      Parameters:
      x - the horizontal coordinate
      y - the vertical coordinate
      Returns:
      pixel at coordinates (x,y) of this image. (0,0) is top left corner pixel.
      Throws:
      UnknownPixelException - if coordinates (x,y) are not valid for this image
